Record.ClassificationPath: Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Lipid Metabolism Disorders/Dyslipidemias/Hyperlipidemias/Hyperlipoproteinemias
Record.Description: Conditions with abnormally elevated levels of LIPOPROTEINS in the blood. They may be inherited, acquired, primary, or secondary. Hyperlipoproteinemias are classified according to the pattern of lipoproteins on electrophoresis or ultracentrifugation.
